sense.def:
A brush
je predmet, na katerega je pritrjeno veliko število ščetin; uporablja se za pometanje, česanje ali pleskanje.

To brush something
pomeni nekaj čistiti ali urejati s ščetko.

seg.quote: I'm going to brush my teeth.
Give the carpet a hard brush.

sense.def:
To brush something away
pomeni nekaj odstraniti tako, da stvar nalahno odrinemo z roko.

seg.quote: She brushed back the hair from her eyes.

sense.def:
To brush something
ali
to brush against something
pomeni mimogrede se nečesa nalahno dotakniti.

seg.quote: The girl's hair brushed his cheek.

sense.def:
To brush aside an idea, remark, or feeling
pomeni zavrniti, da bi razmišljali o tisti ideji, pripombi ali čustvu, ker se nam ne zdi pomembno.

cit.quote: ne upoštevati, prezreti, ne meniti se

sense.def:
To brush up a subject
ali
to brush up on a subject
pomeni obnoviti ali izboljšati svoje védenje o nečem.

seg.quote: They need to brush up their French.
